21-0886.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the State Legislation Committee meeting held Tuesday, May 25, 2021.A motion was made by Chair Uranga, seconded by Vice Chair Austin, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Uranga and AustinPage 1 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 1:00 PMWEDNESDAY, AUGUST 25, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHSTATE LEGISLATION COMMITTEE MINUTESAbsent: 1 - Richardson2.

21-0887.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a presentation on the State’s FY 22 Adopted Budget. Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Vice Mayor Richardson joined the meeting.Vice Mayor Richardson spoke.Vice Chair Austin spoke.Chair Uranga spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Uranga and Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs.Vice Mayor Richardson spoke.Vice Chair Austin spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.Vice Mayor Richardson spoke.Chair Uranga spoke.A motion was made by Member Richardson, seconded by Vice Chair Austin, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Uranga, Austin and Richardson3.

21-0888.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a presentation on State funding and legislative proposals related to broadband and digital inclusion.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke; and provided a Page 2 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 1:00 PMWEDNESDAY, AUGUST 25, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHSTATE LEGISLATION COMMITTEE MINUTESPowerPoint presentation.Vice Chair Austin spoke.Vice Mayor Richardson spoke.Chair Uranga spoke.Jacob O'Donnell spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Austin, seconded by Chair Uranga, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Uranga, Austin and Richardson4.

21-0889.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a presentation on legislative proposals related to housing.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Christopher Koontz, Deputy Director, spoke; and continued the PowerPoint presentation.Chair Uranga spoke.Vice Mayor Richardson spoke.Vice Chair Austin spoke.Chair Uranga spoke.Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Uranga and Tyler Curley, Manager of Government Affairs.Jacob O'Donnell spoke.Page 3 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 1:00 PMWEDNESDAY, AUGUST 25, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHSTATE LEGISLATION COMMITTEE MINUTESA motion was made by Chair Uranga, seconded by Member Richardson, to approve recommendation.
